channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Build declarative agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot with MCP】使用 MCP 为 Microsoft 365 Copilot 构建声明式代理
item.description: 【The Model Context Protocol (MCP) is revolutionizing AI by providing a universal integration standard for the external systems, unlocking unprecedented capabilities, transforming how AI models access and utilize real-time data.】模型上下文协议 (MCP) 为外部系统提供通用集成标准，释放前所未有的功能，改变人工智能模型访问和利用实时数据的方式，从而彻底改变了人工智能。

item.title: 【How to Build iOS Widgets with .NET MAUI】如何使用 .NET MAUI 构建 iOS 小部件
item.description: 【This is a guest blog from Toine de Boer. I'm a .NET developer primarily focused on .NET MAUI to ASP.NET backend services. Because I recently have worked a lot with Widgets and encountered many obstacles and very limited documentation in the initial phas】这是 Toine de Boer 的客座博客。我是一名 .NET 开发人员，主要关注 .NET MAUI 到 ASP.NET 后端服务。因为我最近与 Widgets 进行了很多工作，并且在初始阶段遇到了许多障碍和非常有限的文档

item.title: 【Behind the scenes of the Visual Studio feedback system】Visual Studio 反馈系统的幕后故事
item.description: 【Here on the Visual Studio team, our top priority is making your coding experience smoother and more enjoyable. And that begins with truly listening to your feedback. We understand that sometimes sharing your thoughts can feel like tossing bug reports and suggestions into a black hole. It doesn’t feel good, and we get it. But here’s the】在 Visual Studio 团队中，我们的首要任务是让您的编码体验更顺畅、更愉快。这首先要真正倾听您的反馈。我们理解，有时分享您的想法就像将错误报告和建议扔进黑洞。感觉不太好，我们明白了。但这里是

item.title: 【Misunderstanding what the Cricket Celebration Bowl is】误解板球庆祝碗是什么
item.description: 【Apparently, late last week was an event known as the Cricket Celebration Bowl. I thought to myself, "The Cricket Celebration Bowl sounds like the name of the least popular item on the Panera menu." And no, it's not a cricket match either.】显然，上周晚些时候举办了一场名为“板球庆祝碗”的活动。我心里想，“板球庆典碗听起来像是帕尼拉菜单上最不受欢迎的菜品的名字。”不，这也不是板球比赛。

item.title: 【The Windows clipboard automatic text conversion algorithm is path-dependent】Windows剪贴板自动文本转换算法是路径相关的
item.description: 【We closed last time with this table: To get First try】上次我们用这张桌子结束了：第一次尝试

item.title: 【Resolving an ambiguity in the Windows clipboard automated text conversion table】解决 Windows 剪贴板自动文本转换表中的歧义
item.description: 【Last time, we encountered a mystery where the synthesis of CF_OEM­TEXT from CF_TEXT did not use Ansi­To­Oem.】上次，我们遇到了一个谜团，从CF_TEXT合成CF_OEMTEXT没有使用AnsiToOem。

item.title: 【Retirement of Global Personal Access Tokens in Azure DevOps】Azure DevOps 中全局个人访问令牌的停用
item.description: 【In the new year, we’ll be retiring the Global Personal Access Token (PAT) type in Azure DevOps. Global PATs allow users to authenticate across all accessible organizations. While this can feel convenient, a single credential with broad reach creates a concentrated security risk — especially as a user’s access】新的一年，我们将在 Azure DevOps 中停用全局个人访问令牌 (PAT) 类型。全局 PAT 允许用户在所有可访问的组织中进行身份验证。虽然这感觉很方便，但具有广泛影响力的单一凭证会带来集中的安全风险——尤其是当用户访问时

item.title: 【Studying the various locale mismatch scenarios in Windows clipboard text format synthesis】研究Windows剪贴板文本格式合成中的各种区域设置不匹配场景
item.description: 【So far, we've learned that the conversion between Unicode and the 8-bit ANSI and OEM code pages is performed with the assistance of the CF_LOCALE clipboard format, which itself c】到目前为止，我们已经了解到 Unicode 与 8 位 ANSI 和 OEM 代码页之间的转换是在 CF_LOCALE 剪贴板格式的帮助下执行的，该格式本身就是 c

item.title: 【Making Windows Terminal awesome with GitHub Copilot CLI】使用 GitHub Copilot CLI 让 Windows 终端变得更加出色
item.description: 【As someone who lives and breathes in the command line, I love making my terminal feel like home. Windows Terminal is full of personalization options that really allow for a custom experience. Additionally, I can stay within my terminal for my development with GitHub Copilot with the GitHub Copilot CLI. Let's walk through how you can trick out】作为一个在命令行中生活和呼吸的人，我喜欢让我的终端感觉像家一样。 Windows Terminal 充满了个性化选项，可以真正实现自定义体验。此外，我可以通过 GitHub Copilot CLI 留在终端中使用 GitHub Copilot 进行开发。让我们来看看如何欺骗

item.title: 【Aspire Integrations, Batteries Included】Aspire 集成，包含电池
item.description: 【Aspire Integrations: Batteries included Modern applications depend on many external services: databases, caches, message brokers, storage layers, observability tools, and sometimes AI systems. Each of these brings its own rules for configuration, connection strings, environment variables, authentication, and deployment. Setting al】Aspire 集成：包含电池现代应用程序依赖于许多外部服务：数据库、缓存、消息代理、存储层、可观察性工具，有时还包括人工智能系统。其中每一个都有自己的配置、连接字符串、环境变量、身份验证和部署规则。设置全部
